"You Should Go Wizard":
"...you should go Wizard. We have both
attack and recovery photon magics at our
disposal. Very convenient. Totally all-purpose.
So why wouldn't you go Wizard?

Well, are you going Wizard or not?
It's a complete waste if you don't.
After all, you're free to change classes.
You'll understand once you've experienced
the superiority of its photon magics."

"……フォースは、おすすめ。
テクニックは攻撃も回復もできる
便利で万能なもの。使わない理由がない。

……貴方、フォースになってみる気は？
せっかく自在にクラスを変更できるのに
なってみないのは損。
テクニックの優位性、体験すれば解るわよ。"
"フォースになってマールーに話す"
